languages.text: "Нам осталось погрузить не так много — основной объем уже на баржах, оставшееся загружается в автоматическом режиме. Осталось решить как быть с живой десятиной. Они безответственно расплодились и теперь их количество вдвое превышает первоначальное".

"We do not have much left to load. The bulk of it is already on the barges, and the rest is being delivered automatically. We merely need to decide what to do with the living tithe. They have bred irresponsibly and are now twice as numerous as before."
languages.original_text: "Нам осталось погрузить не так много — основной объем уже на баржах, оставшееся загружается в автоматическом режиме. Осталось решить как быть с живой десятиной. Они безответственно расплодились и теперь их количество вдвое превышает первоначальное".

traits.locale_text: "We do not have much left to load, the bulk is already on the barges and the rest is being delivered automatically. We merely need to decide what to do with the living tithe. They have bred irresponsibly and now are twice as numerous as before."

"We do not have much left to load, the bulk is already on the barges and the rest is being delivered automatically. We merely need to decide what to do with the living tithe. They have bred irresponsibly and now are twice as numerous as before."

"We do not have much left to load. The bulk of it is already on the barges, and the rest is being delivered automatically. We merely need to decide what to do with the living tithe. They have bred irresponsibly and are now twice as numerous as before."

languages.text: «No nos queda mucho que cargar. La mayoría ya está en las naves, y el resto se entregará de forma automática. Ya solo nos queda decidir qué hacer con el diezmo viviente. Han criado de forma irresponsable y han duplicado su número original».
languages.original_text: "We do not have much left to load. The bulk of it is already on the barges, and the rest is being delivered automatically. We merely need to decide what to do with the living tithe. They have bred irresponsibly and are now twice as numerous as before."

traits.locale_text: «No nos queda mucho que cargar. La mayoría ya está en las naves, y el resto se entregará de forma automática. Ya solo nos queda decidir qué hacer con el diezmo viviente. Han criado de forma irresponsable y han duplicado su número original».

languages.text: “我们要运的货物已经不多了。绝大部分货物已经运到了驳船上，剩下的部分正在自动装船。现在，我们只要决定该如何处理生物资源就可以了。那些生物资源毫无限制地自由繁殖，如今数量已经变为了之前的两倍。”
languages.original_text: "We do not have much left to load. The bulk of it is already on the barges, and the rest is being delivered automatically. We merely need to decide what to do with the living tithe. They have bred irresponsibly and are now twice as numerous as before."

traits.locale_text: “我们要运的货物已经不多了。绝大部分货物已经运到了驳船上，剩下的部分正在自动装船。现在，我们只要决定该如何处理生物资源就可以了。那些生物资源毫无限制地自由繁殖，如今数量已经变为了之前的两倍。”

languages.text: 「積み込むものはそれほど残っていません。そのほとんどはすでに荷船に積まれており、残りは自動的に運ばれています。生きている租税をどうするか決定する必要があるだけです。彼らは無責任に繁殖し、前に比べて現在は2倍になっています」
languages.original_text: "We do not have much left to load. The bulk of it is already on the barges, and the rest is being delivered automatically. We merely need to decide what to do with the living tithe. They have bred irresponsibly and are now twice as numerous as before."

traits.locale_text: 「積み込むものはそれほど残っていません。そのほとんどはすでに荷船に積まれており、残りは自動的に運ばれています。生きている租税をどうするか決定する必要があるだけです。彼らは無責任に繁殖し、前に比べて現在は2倍になっています」

languages.text: « Le chargement sera bientôt terminé. Le gros de la cargaison a déjà été transféré à bord des barges, et la procédure suit son cours. Il ne nous reste plus qu'à décider quoi faire de la dîme vivante. Elle s'est reproduite de façon inconsidérée et est à présent deux fois plus nombreuse qu'auparavant. »
languages.original_text: "We do not have much left to load. The bulk of it is already on the barges, and the rest is being delivered automatically. We merely need to decide what to do with the living tithe. They have bred irresponsibly and are now twice as numerous as before."

traits.locale_text: « Le chargement sera bientôt terminé. Le gros de la cargaison a déjà été transféré à bord des barges, et la procédure suit son cours. Il ne nous reste plus qu'à décider quoi faire de la dîme vivante. Elle s'est reproduite de façon inconsidérée et est à présent deux fois plus nombreuse qu'auparavant. »

languages.text: "Yüklenecek pek fazla bir şey kalmadı. Aşarın büyük çoğunluğu hâlihazırda mavnalarda, geri kalanı ise otomatik olarak getiriliyor. Yalnızca canlı aşara ne yapılacağına karar verilmeli. Sorumsuzca ürediler, nüfusları eskisinin iki katına ulaştı."
languages.original_text: "We do not have much left to load. The bulk of it is already on the barges, and the rest is being delivered automatically. We merely need to decide what to do with the living tithe. They have bred irresponsibly and are now twice as numerous as before."

traits.locale_text: "Yüklenecek pek fazla bir şey kalmadı. Aşarın büyük çoğunluğu hâlihazırda mavnalarda, geri kalanı ise otomatik olarak getiriliyor. Yalnızca canlı aşara ne yapılacağına karar verilmeli. Sorumsuzca ürediler, nüfusları eskisinin iki katına ulaştı."

languages.text: "Die Verladung ist fast abgeschlossen. Der Großteil ist schon auf den Lastschiffen und der Rest wird automatisch geliefert. Wir müssen uns nur noch überlegen, was wir mit dem lebenden Zehnt machen. Sie haben sich verantwortungslos gepaart und sind jetzt doppelt so zahlreich wie zuvor."
languages.original_text: "We do not have much left to load. The bulk of it is already on the barges, and the rest is being delivered automatically. We merely need to decide what to do with the living tithe. They have bred irresponsibly and are now twice as numerous as before."

traits.locale_text: "Die Verladung ist fast abgeschlossen. Der Großteil ist schon auf den Lastschiffen und der Rest wird automatisch geliefert. Wir müssen uns nur noch überlegen, was wir mit dem lebenden Zehnt machen. Sie haben sich verantwortungslos gepaart und sind jetzt doppelt so zahlreich wie zuvor."
